metadata.Title: CVE-2023-31083 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/bluetooth/hci_ldisc.c in the Linuxkernel 6.2. In hci_uart_tty_ioctl, there is a race condition betweenHCIUARTSETPROTO and HCIUARTGETPROTO. HCI_UART_PROTO_SET is set beforehu->proto is set. A NULL pointer dereference may occur.
